I think the problem is caused in PersistenceProjectImpl#getSchema(). The call to getConnection().getDatabase().schemaNamed(getSchemaName()) returns null. This happend because the Schema was actually created during the running Eclipse session. Thus, Dali had the schema name but could not find a schema for it. After restarting Eclipse and reconnecting the schema was available.

Does Dali caches the DB data once a connection was established and never refreshes it?
Fixed the case when the default schema, or the selected schema does not exist.
